name: N V Nayak
description: Narayan V Nayak is a Banking and Finance professional with more than 4 decades of experience in this area. He has worked in various capacities and in diverse banking areas in a leading nationalized bank since 1971. Quit the bank in 2005 and worked as financial advisor to an SME with an export turnover of ₹500 crores for about 3 years. Did voluntary work for an NGO engaged in doing pioneering work in bringing about change in civil society. Thereafter, he joined Manipal group’s initiative as a faculty for their PGDBF program in banking, finance and insurance. He has written a number of articles for the benefit of the students/faculty and published an e-book on foreign exchange which is available for sale on Amazon.in. His hobbies include but not limited to reading, writing, travel, music and cooking.
